title: BSc Computer Science - First Class Honours
description: Completed a comprehensive Computer Science degree with First Class Honours. Strong foundation in programming, algorithms, cyber security, and machine learning.

title: Junior Developer
description: Completed a 5-month intensive software development training programme as part of the graduate programme, learning industry best practices, company standards, and modern development methodologies.
highlights: Learned company development standards and best practices
Gained experience with technologies including C#, JavaScript, React, Angular, SQL, Git.
Prepared for client-facing project work and team collaboration

title: Junior Developer
description: Software developer in an Agile Scrum team working on Innovation Group's Gateway Insurance platform. Transitioned from graduate training to production development, contributing to a large-scale microservice architecture alongside 10 concurrent development teams.
highlights: Delivered production features using C#, Angular, and SQL for a major US insurance partner
Contributed across backend, frontend, and database layers during 2-week sprint cycles
Participated in structured code review process and maintained unit tests for reliability
Adapted quickly to changing requirements and priorities in a dynamic multi-team environment
Used Git and Azure DevOps for version control, work item tracking, and CI/CD pipelines
Communicated effectively across developers, testers, product owners, and external teams
